definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: After rolling, these inclusions turn from ball-like shape to chain-like and dot-linked shapes.
sentences.chinese: 夾雜形狀經軋製後由球形逐漸變爲長條形和點鏈狀。

sentences.english: Bar code is one of the investigation and popular anti-counterfeiting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 條形碼是國際上通行的防僞措施之一。

sentences.english: The app utilises the camera on a mobile phone, which scans the barcode.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序用到手機上的攝像頭，用來掃描條形碼。

sentences.english: I cut down a big tree, and then began to make a long hole in it.
sentences.chinese: 我砍倒了一棵大樹，然後開始掏成一個長條形洞。

sentences.english: Last year’s sales figures for all our markets are shown on this bar chart.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有市場去年的銷售數字都顯示在這個條形圖上。

sentences.english: Gets or sets the shape used with the 3-D bar or column chart.
sentences.chinese: 獲取或設置用於三維條形或柱形圖的形狀。

sentences.english: Assigns unique barcodes for each container in the system.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的條形碼分配每個集裝箱在系統中。

sentences.english: There are two-dimensional and three-dimensional barcode readers available.
sentences.chinese: 有一些二維和三維的條形碼讀取器。

sentences.english: Which bar chart represents the average speed of the vehicles?
sentences.chinese: 哪個條形統計圖代表這些交通工具的速度？

sentences.english: These tags will replace the bar-coded dangle tags.
sentences.chinese: 這些標籤將會替代條形碼垂型標籤。

sentences.english: The first product to have a bar code was Wrigleys gum。
sentences.chinese: 世界上最早有條形碼標記的商品是箭牌香口膠。

sentences.english: Triangularly distributed load on an infinitely long strip-area.
sentences.chinese: 三角形荷載作用在無限長的條形面積上。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new T-arrangement rectangular float valve .
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種新的T形排列條形浮閥塔板。

sentences.english: The alloying layer was formed on the saw blade tooth of 20 steel by ion penetrating W and Mo.
sentences.chinese: 鋸的主要部分，長條形薄鋼片，上面有許多尖齒。

sentences.english: The influence of over-consolidation ratio on the critical bearing capacity for strip foundation is less significant.
sentences.chinese: 超固結比對條形地基臨界荷載的影響較小。

definition: base (of a triangle)/base line/hem line (of skirt)
